alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 15 at 4:23AM AKDT until May 16 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Visibility one Quarter mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
